usefulItems: baking tray, wire rack, airtight container, silicone or aluminium muffin moulds (Ø 7 cm, height 4 cm), skewer, oven
title: Chocolate Beetroot Muffins

ingredients.content: 100 g milk chocolate, in small pieces or callets

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and place 12 silicone muffin moulds on a baking tray.
Place beetroot in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place eggs and sugar in mixing bowl then mix <b>4 min/speed 4<b>, until batter is light and fluffy and has expanded in volume.
Add flour, cocoa powder, reserved beetroot and baking powder then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add yoghurt, chocolate and vanilla paste then mix <b>5 sec/speed 2<b>. Spoon batter into muffin moulds three-quarters full, then bake for 15-20 minutes (180°C) until a skewer inserted in centre comes out clean.
Remove muffins from oven and allow to cool slightly in moulds, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container until required.
